enhanced_by.reason: The contains method is used to check if the attributeID already exists before adding it, ensuring no duplicates.
The getAttributeCount method can be used to verify the number of attributes before and after adding a new attribute.
The encode method must be invoked after adding an attribute to ensure the binary representation is updated.
The decodeAttributeBody method may need to be invoked before adding attributes if the attributes are being decoded from a binary array.
